data.message: So awesome to see that u are thinking about our kids there has been many times that I have had to sign up for help with school supplies backpacks ect... Being a single parent is very hard and when there is a program that helps the kids that's great otherwise they would be going to school feeling less than so to hear that you are helping these kids is so heartwarming Thank you for your donation I know that it will make our kids feel confident and in aww that Eminem was thinking of them
